00001 program test_grid_allocation
00002 
00003 use types
00004 use swb_grid
00005 
00006 implicit none
00007 
00008 type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: model_grd      ! Grid of model cells
00009 
00010 integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNX                     ! Number of cells in the x-direction
00011 integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNY                     ! Number of cells in the y-direction
00012 integer (kind=T_INT) :: iValue                  ! Temporary value for 'CONSTANT'
00013 integer (kind=T_INT) :: iStat                   ! For 'iostat=' checks
00014 integer (kind=T_INT) :: i
00015 integer :: iSize,iSizeCells,iSizeSingleCell,iNumCells
00016 real (kind=T_DBL) :: rX0, rY0                  ! Model grid extent (lower-left)
00017 real (kind=T_DBL) :: rX1, rY1                  ! Model grid extent (upper-right)
00018 
00019 ![LOCALS]
00020 
00021 rX0 = 10
00022 rY0 = 10
00023 rX1 = 1000
00024 rY1 = 1000
00025 
00026 model_grd => null()
00027 
00028 do
00029 
00030   print *
00031   print *,'Number of columns?'
00032   read(*,*) iNX
00033 
00034   print *,'Number of rows?'
00035   read(*,*) iNY
00036 
00037   model_grd => grid_Create(iNX, iNY, rX0, rY0, rX1, rY1, T_CELL_GRID)
00038 
00039   iSize = SIZEOF(model_grd)
00040   iSizeCells = SIZEOF(model_grd%Cells)
00041   iNumCells = SIZE(model_grd%Cells)
00042   iSizeSingleCell = iSizeCells / iNumCells
00043 
00044   print *
00045   print *, 'Number of cells: ',iNY*iNX
00046   print *, 'Allocated size (Grid):',iSize
00047   print *, 'Allocated size (Cells):',iSizeCells,'(',iSizeCells/1024./1024.,' MB)'
00048   print *, 'Memory required for each grid cell: ',iSizeSingleCell,' (bytes)'
00049 
00050   call grid_Destroy(model_grd)
00051   model_grd => null()
00052 
00053 end do
00054 
00055 end program test_grid_allocation
